pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, November 4, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a memorial service to celebrate the life of former Ontario Premier William G. Davis.

The ceremony will be livestreamed on the Government of Ontario YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC52PuW11VWClr0ovpinPKsg

Brampton, Ontario

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local Indian restaurant on the occasion of Diwali.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
